text: John William Sheldrick (born 1939), is a male former athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England and won a bronze medal in the discus at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. He was a member of the Thames Valley Club. ==Personal life== During the Games he met his future wife Prue O'Connor and stayed in Australia, therefore officially emigrating. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:English male discus throwers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: John Sheldrick
